messages.content: how many departments in giki?

GIKI offers the following undergraduate programs:

- Computer Engineering
- Electrical Engineering
- Mechanical Engineering
- Chemical Engineering
- Materials Engineering
- Industrial Engineering
- Faculty of Computer Sciences and Engineering
- Faculty of Engineering Sciences
- Faculty of Materials and Chemical Engineering

where is giki located
GIKI is located in Topi, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan. The campus spans 400 acres.
can you tell me about Admission process

Admission to GIKI is based on the following criteria:
        1. GIKI Entry Test
        2. Academic Record
        3. Interview (for shortlisted candidates)
        
        The admission process usually starts in June-July each year.
can you tell me Available facilities

GIKI offers the following facilities:

Academic:
- Central Library
- Computer Labs
- Engineering Labs
- Research Centers
- Lecture Halls

Residential:
- Male Hostels
- Female Hostels
- Faculty Housing

Recreational:
- Sports Complex
- Gymnasium
- Cricket Ground
- Football Ground
- Basketball Courts
tell me about Upcoming events
The next event is Spring Break scheduled for March 25-29, 2024. Spring semester break for all students
what is giki

GIKI (Ghulam Ishaq Khan Institute of Engineering Sciences and Technology) is a Private university established in 1993.
        It is located in Topi, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan with a campus size of 400 acres.
when admission test will be conducted

Admission to GIKI is based on the following criteria:
        1. GIKI Entry Test
        2. Academic Record
        3. Interview (for shortlisted candidates)
        
        The admission process usually starts in June-July each year.
